verses.verse: Then <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H662>refrain<s%> himself before all them that <S%H5324>stood<s%> by him; and he <S%H7121>cried<s%>, <S%H3318>Cause<s%> every <S%H376>man<s%> to go <S%H3318>out<s%> from me. And there <S%H5975>stood<s%> no <S%H376>man<s%> with him, while <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> made himself <S%H3045>known<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>.
And he <S%H6963%H1065>wept<s%> <S%H5414>aloud<s%>: and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> and the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H8085%H8085>heard<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, I am <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>; doth my <S%H1>father<s%> yet <S%H2416>live<s%>? And his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H6030>answer<s%> him; for they were <S%H926>troubled<s%> at his <S%H6440>presence<s%>.

And <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, Come <S%H5066>near<s%> to me, I pray you. And they came <S%H5066>near<s%>. And he <S%H559>said<s%>, I am <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%>, whom ye <S%H4376>sold<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

Now therefore be not <S%H6087>grieved<s%>, nor <S%H2734>angry<s%> with <S%H5869>yourselves<s%>, that ye <S%H4376>sold<s%> me hither: for <S%H430>God<s%> did <S%H7971>send<s%> me before <S%H6440>you<s%> to preserve <S%H4241>life<s%>.

For these two <S%H8141>years<s%> hath the <S%H7458>famine<s%> been <S%H7130>in<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%>: and yet there are <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%>, in the which there shall <S%H369>neither<s%> be <S%H2758>earing<s%> nor <S%H7105>harvest<s%>.

And <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> me before <S%H6440>you<s%> to <S%H7760>preserve<s%> you a <S%H7611>posterity<s%> in the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and to save your <S%H2421>lives<s%> by a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H6413>deliverance<s%>.

So now it was not you that <S%H7971>sent<s%> me hither, but <S%H430>God<s%>: and he hath <S%H7760>made<s%> me a <S%H1>father<s%> to <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H113>lord<s%> of all his <S%H1004>house<s%>, and a <S%H4910>ruler<s%> throughout all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>.

<S%H4116>Haste<s%> ye, and go <S%H5927>up<s%> to my <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H559>say<s%> unto him, Thus <S%H559>saith<s%> thy <S%H1121>son<s%> <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H430>God<s%> hath <S%H7760>made<s%> me <S%H113>lord<s%> of all <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>: come <S%H3381>down<s%> unto me, <S%H5975>tarry<s%> not:

And thou shalt <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1657>Goshen<s%>, and thou shalt be <S%H7138>near<s%> unto me, thou, and thy <S%H1121>children<s%>, and thy <S%H1121>children's<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%>, and thy <S%H6629>flocks<s%>, and thy <S%H1241>herds<s%>, and all that thou hast:

And there will I <S%H3557>nourish<s%> thee; for yet there are <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H8141>years<s%> of <S%H7458>famine<s%>; lest thou, and thy <S%H1004>household<s%>, and all that thou hast, come to <S%H3423>poverty<s%>.
And, behold, your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> <S%H7200>see<s%>, and the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of my <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%>, that it is my <S%H6310>mouth<s%> that <S%H1696>speaketh<s%> unto you.

And ye shall <S%H5046>tell<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> of all my <S%H3519>glory<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and of all that ye have <S%H7200>seen<s%>; and ye shall <S%H4116>haste<s%> and bring <S%H3381>down<s%> my <S%H1>father<s%> hither.
And he <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon his <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H1144>Benjamin's<s%> <S%H6677>neck<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%>; and <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> <S%H1058>wept<s%> upon his <S%H6677>neck<s%>.
Moreover he <S%H5401>kissed<s%> all his <S%H251>brethren<s%>, and <S%H1058>wept<s%> upon them: and <S%H310>after<s%> that his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H1696>talked<s%> with him.

¶ And the <S%H6963>fame<s%> thereof was <S%H8085>heard<s%> in <S%H6547>Pharaoh's<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%>, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3130>Joseph's<s%> <S%H251>brethren<s%> are <S%H935>come<s%>: and it <S%H3190%H5869>pleased<s%> <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H3190%H5869>well<s%>, <S%H5869>and<s%> his <S%H5650>servants<s%>.

And <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> unto <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, <S%H559>Say<s%> unto thy <S%H251>brethren<s%>, This <S%H6213>do<s%> ye; <S%H2943>lade<s%> your <S%H1165>beasts<s%>, and <S%H3212>go<s%>, <S%H935>get<s%> you unto the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%>;

And <S%H3947>take<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%> and your <S%H1004>households<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%> unto me: and I will <S%H5414>give<s%> you the <S%H2898>good<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and ye shall <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2459>fat<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%>.

Now thou art <S%H6680>commanded<s%>, this <S%H6213>do<s%> ye; <S%H3947>take<s%> you <S%H5699>wagons<s%> out of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> for your little <S%H2945>ones<s%>, and for your <S%H802>wives<s%>, and <S%H5375>bring<s%> your <S%H1>father<s%>, and <S%H935>come<s%>.
<S%H5869>Also<s%> <S%H2347>regard<s%> not your <S%H3627>stuff<s%>; for the <S%H2898>good<s%> of all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> is yours.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> so: and <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H5699>wagons<s%>, according to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh<s%>, and <S%H5414>gave<s%> them <S%H6720>provision<s%> for the <S%H1870>way<s%>.

To all of them he <S%H5414>gave<s%> each <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H8071>raiment<s%>; but to <S%H1144>Benjamin<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> pieces of <S%H3701>silver<s%>, and <S%H2568>five<s%> <S%H2487>changes<s%> of <S%H8071>raiment<s%>.

And to his <S%H1>father<s%> he <S%H7971>sent<s%> after <S%H2063>this<s%> manner; <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H860>asses<s%> <S%H5375>laden<s%> with the good <S%H2898>things<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H6235>ten<s%> she <S%H2543>asses<s%> <S%H5375>laden<s%> with <S%H1250>corn<s%> and <S%H3899>bread<s%> and <S%H4202>meat<s%> for his <S%H1>father<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>.
So he <S%H7971>sent<s%> his <S%H251>brethren<s%> <S%H7971>away<s%>, and they <S%H3212>departed<s%>: and he <S%H559>said<s%> unto them, See that ye fall not <S%H7264>out<s%> by the <S%H1870>way<s%>.
¶ And they went <S%H5927>up<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>, and <S%H935>came<s%> into the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H3667>Canaan<s%> unto <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%>,

And <S%H5046>told<s%> him, <S%H559>saying<s%>, <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> is yet <S%H2416>alive<s%>, and he is <S%H4910>governor<s%> over all the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%>. And Jacob's <S%H3820>heart<s%> <S%H6313>fainted<s%>, for he <S%H539>believed<s%> them not.

And they <S%H1696>told<s%> him all the <S%H1697>words<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%>, which he had <S%H1696>said<s%> unto them: and when he <S%H7200>saw<s%> the <S%H5699>wagons<s%> which <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> had <S%H7971>sent<s%> to <S%H5375>carry<s%> him, the <S%H7307>spirit<s%> of <S%H3290>Jacob<s%> their <S%H1>father<s%> <S%H2421>revived<s%>:

And <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%>, It is <S%H7227>enough<s%>; <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> my <S%H1121>son<s%> is yet <S%H2416>alive<s%>: I will <S%H3212>go<s%> and see <S%H7200>him<s%> before I <S%H4191>die<s%>.
